name: Dungeons & Dragons OnlineÂ®
content:
files:
- setup: http://content.turbine.com/sites/clientdl/ddo/ddolive.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/Dungeons & Dragons Online/TurbineLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/StandingStoneGames/Dungeons & Dragons
      Online
    src: setup
- task:
    description: Installing Dungeons & Dragons
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
  reset_pulse: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
